title: Adios Pro 2.0 TME Shoes
subtitle: Running
description:
Better together. These adidas running shoes were designed in collaboration with the Tinman Elite running club to celebrate teamwork and community. They bring record-breaking speed to training and long-distance racing. The ultralight feel comes from Lightstrike Pro, our most resilient foam that helps maintain energy long term. ENERGYRODS provide lightweight stiffness and limit energy loss.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Textile upper; Synthetic lining; ENERGYRODS limit energy loss; Lightstrike Pro cushioning; Weight: 8.3 ounces (size 9); Midsole drop: 9 mm (heel: 39 mm / forefoot: 30 mm); Continental™ Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Gold Metallic / Grey One; Product code: GX9300

title: Adilette Shower Slides
subtitle: Children Essentials
description: Treat their feet after they hop out of the pool with these kids' comfortable slides. Quick-drying and ultra-soft, they cradle their feet with lightweight cushioning. Big and bold adidas branding adds a classic look.
details: Regular fit; Slip-on construction; Single-bandage synthetic upper; EVA outsole; Pillow-soft Cloudfoam footbed; Soft cushioning; Quick-drying material; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Cloud White / Core Black; Product code: G27625
colors: Core Black / Cloud White / Vivid Red

title: Nizza Hi Shoes
subtitle: Men's Originals
description:
Change is possible when we work together. That's why we've teamed up with Parley for the Oceans on these adidas Nizza shoes — as a reminder that we all have a part to play in helping to end plastic waste. The evolution of this icon is rooted in the classic elements you covet: high top fit, signature rubber toe bumper and strong adidas vibes.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic —  reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
details: Lace closure; Textile upper; Synthetic lining; Vulcanized rubber outsole; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Cloud White / Core Black; Product code: GV7607
colors: Cloud White / Cloud White / Core Black

title: Runfalcon 2.0 Shoes
subtitle: Children Sportswear
description: Shoes for everyday wear, from the halls at school to gym class to running errands with you on the weekend. Whether your kid is new to the track team or just needs to move through the day with confidence, these adidas sneakers deliver. A lightweight feel provides comfort even on the longest days.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Textile upper; Lightweight feel; Textile lining; EVA midsole; Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Almost Blue / Beam Pink / Bliss Orange; Product code: HR1412
colors: Carbon / Cloud White / Impact Orange

title: adidas x LEGO® Sport Pro Shoes
subtitle: Children Training
description:
Let your little builder bring their LEGO® bricks with them wherever they go. Watch your kids smile with glee as they pull on these adidas running shoes. The elastic laces plus hook-and-loop strap create a snug, secure fit. The grippy outsole leaves a happy trail of LEGO® tracks behind them.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Regular fit; Elastic lace closure with hook-and-loop strap; Knit textile upper; TPU heel counter and Torsion bar; Textile lining; Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Eqt Yellow / Off White / Red; Product code: GZ2414
colors: Red / Off White / Shock Blue

title: Swift Run 22 Shoes
subtitle: Youth Sportswear
description:
Remember the first pair of sneakers you fell in love with? Relive the memory every day in these juniors' adidas Swift Run 22 Shoes. Rooted in running but designed for the daily grind, they keep you comfortable with a supportive knit mesh upper and a cushioned EVA midsole. Oh, and they look good too. Win win. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Snug fit; Lace closure; Knit mesh upper; Hugs the foot; EVA midsole; OrthoLite® sockliner; Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Wonder Mauve / Cloud White / Wonder Mauve; Product code: GZ1556
colors: Core Black / Grey Five / Cloud White

title: Adizero Adios 7 Shoes
subtitle: Men's Running
description: Chase your next PR in these adidas Adizero running shoes. The breathable mesh upper rides on a mix of superlight Lightstrike cushioning and resilient Lightstrike Pro. The combination makes these shoes fast enough for race day while being able to stand up to everyday training. TORSIONRODS add a soft stiffness that increases force transfer in each stride. The result? A pair of running shoes that help you run faster (and longer) than ever before, all while feeling fresh on your feet.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Lightweight mesh upper; Flexible feel with support in key areas; TORSIONRODS increase force transfer; Lightstrike cushioning; Weight: 7.7 ounces (size 9); Midsole drop: 8 mm (heel: 27 mm / forefoot: 19 mm); Continental™ Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Beam Yellow / Solar Green; Product code: GY8409
colors: Grey Three / Zero Metalic / Grey Five

title: Ultraboost 1.0 NC State
subtitle: Sportswear
description:
Bring your Wolfpack spirit along for the ride every time you lace up in these Ultraboost running shoes. Comfy BOOST cushioning keeps you energized from start to finish, and adidas PRIMEKNIT flexes and supports the foot with every step. Attach the webbing strips to your laces and show your team pride.

Featured above and throughout the campaign are Jaiden Thomas and Jameese Joseph. Jameese (left) is a senior on NC State’s soccer team. She brought her athleticism and ability to score game-winning goals from her hometown of Beltsville, MD. She’s got great attack instincts, and her dribbling is a joy to watch. She’s a senior studying business administration when she’s off the field. Jameese loves to sleep - when she’s not practicing, at a game, at school, hanging with her friends, eating chicken Alfredo (her favorite food) or shopping with her dad; she loves fashion.

Jaiden (right) is a senior on NC State’s soccer team hailing from Ponte Vedra Beach, FL. She wasn’t always in the starting lineup, but her passion, drive, and commitment to the idea that more is possible has made her a standout player to watch. Outside of her team responsibilities she leads Pack United, a student-athlete activism group that recently worked to bring therapy dogs into the classroom for exams. She also loves to cook, and (although this is unverified by adidas) is very good at it. After college she plans to be an athletic director or work in administration. Jaiden’s favorite adidas collaboration is Ivy Park.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; adidas PRIMEKNIT upper; Interchangeable webbing strips; BOOST midsole; Torsion System; Rubber outsole; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Team Dark Grey / Team Collegiate Red; Product code: HQ5879
colors: Cloud White / Team Maroon / Team Colleg Gold

description: You don't have to run far to feel the benefits of training. Slip on these adidas shoes and you're only a few miles away from a good mood. They're designed for short runs, with a BOOST midsole that offers incredible energy return with every step. The Stretchweb outsole flexes naturally for an energized ride, and Continental™ Rubber gives you superior traction.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Textile upper; BOOST midsole; Textile lining; Midsole drop: 10 mm (heel: 20 mm / forefoot: 10 mm); Stretchweb outsole with Continental™ Rubber; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Shadow Navy / Cloud White / Core Black; Product code: GW9151
colors: Core Black / Cloud White / Carbon

description:
When the days are long, you need something that knows about going the distance. Which these adidas Retropy E5 shoes do, since they use the famed '70s Racing 1 shoes as their foundation. Plush BOOST takes care of all things comfort and makes sure you feel good from morning to night. Really driving in their '70s inspiration, they have stitched leather overlays on the premium upper that nods to the shoes' origins.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Lace closure; Leather upper with leather overlays; BOOST midsole; Textile lining; Rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Green Oxide / Off White / Wonder Red; Product code: GW6779
colors: Focus Olive / Core White / Beam Orange

description:
Inhale. Exhale. Left foot. Right. The outside world melts away, even if only for a few miles, as you find your rhythm in these adidas running shoes. Lightstrike's super light, responsive cushioning has you covered on the comfort side so that nothing takes away from your time hitting the pavement. Speaking of pavement, Continental™ Rubber under the forefoot makes sure you stick it. Push forward in confidence. 

This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Textile upper; Lightstrike cushioning; Textile lining; Weight: 8.4 ounces; Midsole drop: 8.5mm (heel: 39.5 mm / forefoot: 31 mm); Continental™ Rubber outsole; Primegreen; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Cloud White / Gold Metallic; Product code: H67515

description:
An iconic adidas running shoe, the QT Racer is designed for a smooth feel that's great for walking and running. And it's got the timeless looks to match, built around standout 3-Stripes. On the inside, a Cloudfoam midsole elevates cushioning and combines with a soft memory foam sockliner that feels supportive even after lots of wear. You won't be hanging up these shoes anytime soon.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

Down for it all, these adidas hiking shoes are ready for muddy patches and rocky terrain. The Continental™ Rubber outsole offers the durability and stability you need as you push ahead. description:
Little ones are so active that everything they do is high impact. That's why these infants' adidas trainers are designed to be extra supportive. They have a wide fit that lets little feet spread for better balance. And they're made with Cloudfoam cushioning for a soft and snug feel. The chunky, springy rubber outsole is great for stomping in, and when naptime comes, the elastic laces stretch to let you slip them off as easily as you put them on.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

description:
Is it the shape? Is it the color play? One way or another, these chunky adidas sneakers will win you over. The textile upper is comfy and casual. The LIGHTMOTION midsole is soft and springy, while the rubber outsole gives plenty of grip to keep you grounded on slushy streets. description: adidas Skateboarding ups the Gazelle's icon status with a Gazelle ADV that incorporates '90s style for a new generation. Rendered in a black and gum colorway that calls out to one of the most nostalgic eras in skateboarding, the Gazelle ADV features higher foxing tape, Geoflex outsole for grip and flick, and a durable double-layer toe for skateboarding. Finished in premium leather along with iconic embroidery on the heel detailing, the Gazelle ADV is an updated homage to an iconic era.

Bold graphics highlight Lionel Messi's lifelong love affair with the ball.
